revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Cisco |model=RV042 |revision=v3 |asin=B0002I7288 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |type=VPN Router,router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN5010 |cpu1_cspeed=300 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=JS28F256-P33BF |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T51163QJ-BCE7 |ram1_num=2 |jtag=yes |serial=yes |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8309G |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=2 |addl_chips=FPGA;Lattice;LCMXO256-3TN100C;;1;,,, 2A, 18V Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1482DS;;3; |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=F0:F7:55 }} '''Cisco RV042 Dual WAN VPN Router''' [http://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/routers/rv042-dual-wan-vpn-router/index.html Product page] "3000-RV4241G90 Manufactured for CISCO" is silk-screened on the board. === Reviews === *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/31502-cisco-rv042-v3-dual-wan-vpn-router-reviewed ''Cisco RV042 v3 Dual WAN VPN Router Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :[[Cisco RV042 v3]] is powered by a @300MHz [[Cavium]] CN5010, :replacing the Intel IXP425-266 in the [[Cisco RV042]] V1. :RAM and flash have been bumped up to 128 MB and 32 MB, respectively, :up from 32 MB and 8 MB in the original [[Cisco RV042 (Linksys)]]. *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/31525-cisco-rv082-and-rv016-v3-vpn-routers-reviewed ''Cisco RV082 and RV016 v3 VPN Routers Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :Like the RV042, the original 016 and 082 used an Intel IXP425-266 :processor with 16 MB of flash and 64 and 32 MB of RAM, respectively 
Model	   CPU	  Freq.  Flash 	RAM 	Switch
Cisco     Cavium   MHz   (MB)   (MB)    Realtek
RV082 v3  CN5020   300	  32	256	RTL8309G, RTL8306SD
RV042 v3  CN5010   300	  32	128	RTL8309G
RV016 v3  CN5020   300	  32	256	RTL8329M
===See also=== *[[Cisco RV042 v3]] *[[Cisco RV042]] (v1) *[[Cisco RV042 (Linksys)]] *[[Cisco RV082 v3]] *[[Cisco RV082 (Linksys)]] *[[Cisco RV016 v3]] *[[Cisco RV016 (Linksys)]] __NOTOC__
